content: I'm looking for a new laptop, I want to know what features to look for when purchasing online.
When buying a laptop online, it's essential to check the processor speed, RAM, and storage capacity. You can also consider the display size and resolution.
I've heard that some laptops come with built-in software that helps you track your expenses?
Yes, some laptops do come with expense tracking software. However, it's not a standard feature across all brands.
I've been looking at Dell and HP laptops, but I'm having trouble finding the 'report' feature that helps me track my expenses. Can you tell me more about this feature?
Unfortunately, I couldn't find any information on a specific 'report' feature from Dell or HP. You may want to check their official websites for more details.
